sections.heading: 01|Grain handling tax definitions
sections.text: Effective:August 16, 1961Latest Legislation:House Bill 76 - 104th General AssemblyPDF:Download Authenticated PDFAs used in sections5737.01to5737.08, inclusive, of the Revised Code:(A) "Person" includes individuals, corporations, firms, and associations of whatsoever

sections.heading: 08, inclusive, of the Revised Code do not apply to a public utility, as defined in the taxation laws of this state, nor to a farmer as to grain raised and stored, kept, or found on a farm owned or operated by himself
sections.text: Such sections do not exempt any person engaged in any business taxed by such secti
